task_text: Well, cleanroom-compatible coating package for Helvetic FoodTech Equipment needs stronger capability in English language. Who would be the best internal expert outside of the project to consult?

text_blocks: Let me try with a simpler search:
I found the project. Now let me get the project details to see who's on the team, and also find the best English language expert outside the project:

project.name: Cleanroom-compatible coating package
project.description: Coating package for Helvetic FoodTech equipment and adjacent cleanroom surfaces.

text_blocks:
Now I have all the information I need. The project team members are:
- iv5n_036 (Lead)
- iv5n_008 (Engineer) - Daniele Lombardi
- iv5n_122 (QA)

The top English expert is **Lucia Monti** (iv5n_007) with skill_english level 10, and she is NOT on the project team. She is the best internal expert to consult for stronger English language capability.

input.message:
For the cleanroom-compatible coating package project for Helvetic FoodTech Equipment, the best internal expert to consult for English language capability is **Lucia Monti** (Sales & Customer Success, HQ – Italy).

She has an exceptional English skill level of **10/10** – the highest in the company – and is not currently on the project team (which consists of iv5n_036 as Lead, Daniele Lombardi as Engineer, and iv5n_122 as QA).

Additionally, Lucia has a strong willingness to mentor (will_mentor_juniors: 10/10), which makes her an ideal candidate to support the team with English language needs.
